meanings: put (sth) in requisition, requisition, requisition (from), commandeer, lay (sth) under requisition
press carriages and horses into service

examples.korean: the requisition of ships by the government 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부의 선박 지원 요구[선박 징발] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The school was requisitioned as a military hospital. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 학교는 군 병원으로 징발되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The army made a requisition on the villagers for provisions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군(軍)이 마을 사람들에게 식량 징발 명령을 내렸다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The army requisitioned the village for stores. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군은 그 마을에서 비축 식량을 징발했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
